elements.text:
You and your friends are out getting dinner. Your food and drinks arrive, and you accidentally spill your drink down the front of your new white shirt.

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

text: I want to throw away the food and leave, but I clean up and keep eating.
I feel like crying and leave the restaurant.
I laugh and order another drink.
I want to leave immediately, but know that I'll forget about the stain soon.
I wipe up the drink, smile, and keep eating with my friends.
